videopoker

Interface Videopoker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OurVideoPoker, OurVideoPokerFile

    public interface Videopoker
    This Interface represents the methods that a videopoker machine has to implement to provide the minimum game functionalities, in our point of view.
    Author:
    Alexandre, Rui , Pedro

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AdviceResult advice()
      This method is called when we want to ask a advice to the videopoker machine
      BetResult bet()
      This method is called when we want to place a bet in the videopoker machine without any bet credit it should place the same credits of the last previous valid bet in the videopoker machine
      BetResult bet(int credits)
      This method is called when we want to place a bet in the videopoker machine
      CreditResult credit()
      This method is called when we know how much credit does the videopoker machine have.
      DealResult deal()
      This method is called when we want to do the deal in the videopoker machine
      HoldResult hold(boolean[] indexs)
      This method is called when we want to do the hold command in the videopoker machine, that is give the information of what cards do we want to hold.
      void quit()
      This method is called when we want to quit the videopoker machine
      StatisticsResult statistics()
      This method is called when we want to know what are the statistics of the videopoker machine

    • Method Detail

      • bet

        BetResult bet(int credits)
       throws InvalidPlayException
        This method is called when we want to place a bet in the videopoker machine
        Parameters:
        credits - integer with the credits of the bet
        Returns:
        BetResult object with the result of the bet move if it is valid
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - throws this exception if the bet is not valid, with a message that characterizes the error.
        See Also:
        BetResult

      • bet

        BetResult bet()
       throws InvalidPlayException
        This method is called when we want to place a bet in the videopoker machine without any bet credit it should place the same credits of the last previous valid bet in the videopoker machine
        Returns:
        BetResult object with the result of the bet move if it is valid
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - throws this exception if the bet is not valid, with a message that characterizes the error.
        See Also:
        BetResult

      • credit

        CreditResult credit()
             throws InvalidPlayException
        This method is called when we know how much credit does the videopoker machine have.
        Returns:
        CreditResult object with the result command if it is valid
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - throws this exception if the command is not valid, with a message that characterizes the error.
        See Also:
        CreditResult

      • deal

        DealResult deal()
         throws InvalidPlayException
        This method is called when we want to do the deal in the videopoker machine
        Returns:
        DealResult object with the result of the deal move if it is valid
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - throws this exception if the deal is not valid, with a message that characterizes the error.
        See Also:
        DealResult

      • hold

        HoldResult hold(boolean[] indexs)
         throws InvalidPlayException
        This method is called when we want to do the hold command in the videopoker machine, that is give the information of what cards do we want to hold.
        Parameters:
        indexs - boolean array that is true in the index of the cards that we want to hold and false in the ones that we want to discard
        Returns:
        HoldResult object with the result of the Hold move if it is valid
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - throws this exception if the hold is not valid, with a message that characterizes the error.
        See Also:
        HoldResult

      • advice

        AdviceResult advice()
             throws InvalidPlayException
        This method is called when we want to ask a advice to the videopoker machine
        Returns:
        AdviceResult object with the result of the hold move if it is valid
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - throws this exception if the advice command is not valid, with a message that characterizes the error.
        See Also:
        AdviceResult

      • statistics

        StatisticsResult statistics()
                     throws InvalidPlayException
        This method is called when we want to know what are the statistics of the videopoker machine
        Returns:
        StatisticsResult object with the result of the command move if it is valid
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - throws this exception if the command is not valid, with a message that characterizes the error.
        See Also:
        StatisticsResult

      • quit

        void quit()
   throws InvalidPlayException
        This method is called when we want to quit the videopoker machine
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - if it cannot quit it throws a exception with a message that characterizes the error.
